headline: FG empowers MSMEs, manufacturing sectors with N200b to create more jobs
summary: The Federal Government has availed Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) and the manufacturing sectors of N200 billion to create more job opportunities in the country.

headline: FG to fund student loan scheme from education tax
summary: The Federal Government, yesterday, revealed that the Student Loan Scheme it recently initiated would be funded from education

headline: Mixed reactions trail demolition at Enugu Centenary City
summary: Mixed reactions have trailed last weekend’s demolition of buildings at the Centenary City, Obeagu, Awkunanaw, in Enugu South Local Council.

headline: Makinde presents report on explosion to President
summary: Oyo State Governor, Seyi Makinde, has presented the report of last Tuesday's explosion in Ibadan to President Bola Tinubu. According to a statement by Special Adviser to the Governor on Media, Sulaimon Olanrewaju

headline: Woman nabbed for attempting to dump five-month-old baby in river
summary: The police in Ogun State have arrested a 30-year-old woman, Oluwabunmi Ajayi, who was seen dropping her five-month-old baby, Imole Anifowose, into a river in Sagamu.

headline: Court nullifies passage of Rivers’ State 2024 budget
summary: The presentation and passage of the Rivers State 2024 Budget by four-member Ehie Edison-led House of Assembly was, yesterday, described as an aberration. It was, therefore, voided and set aside by a Federal High Court, Abuja, on ground of illegality and unconstitutionality.

headline: Akeredolu to be buried February 23: Family
summary: The family of former Governor of Ondo State, the late Rotimi Akeredolu, has slated Feb. 23 for his burial.

headline: Varsities, hospitals in darkness as FG’s $105m power project flops
summary: Six years after the $105 million-worth of special intervention to electrify public varsities and some tertiary hospitals nationwide, several beneficiaries listed in the phase one of the initiative are yet to get the power supply.

headline: Northern senators fault ‘lopsided’ 2024 budget, relocation of CBN, FAAN offices
summary: Northern senators have rejected the planned relocation of some federal agencies from Abuja to Lagos just as they alleged lopsidedness in the distribution and allocation of resources in the N28.7 trillion 2024 budget against the North.

headline: China: Landslide kills at least 2, dozens missing
summary: At least two people have been killed after a pre-dawn landslide buried homes in the southwest province of Yunnan. A rescue operation is ongoing.

headline: Argentina seizes, expels family of fugitive drug lord 'Fito'
summary: Argentina's authorities believe that Fito's plan was to buy a house there, move the family and then escape from Ecuador’s prison. This comes amid a manhunt for the drug lord, who broke out of jail on January 7.
